summary: A small-town Sheriff discovers there is something wrong with the sleepy town of Golden Torch, and he quickly realizes he may not get out alive.
cast: Danny Hansen|Frankie Ray|Shenik Taylor|Amy Waller|Jonathan Cousens|Sharon Fredrickson|Deirdre V. Lyons|Cassie Carpenter|Cynthia Dane|Joe Karam|Tony Pandolfo|Dan Sutter|Franco Di Vittorio|Todd Andoli|Ashley Devane|Zenaida Gorbea|David Jones|Bruce Kirkpatrick
title: On the Brain
